question: Which organic compound has been suspected as a cause behind Eluru mystery illness?
explanation: A ‘mystery disease’ has left a lot of patients in Eluru, Andhra Pradesh with dizziness and headaches. Current reports are showing  organochlorides as a probable cause .Organochlorines (OC) are a group of chlorinated compounds that belong to the class of persistent organic pollutants . They are used as pesticides.
